title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\QueryInput
name: QueryInput
description:
Represents the query input. It can contain either:

  1. An audio config which instructs the speech recognizer how to process the speech audio.

  2. A conversational query in the form of text,.

  3. An event that specifies which intent to trigger.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.QueryInput

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.audio_config
params.description: Instructs the speech recognizer how to process the speech audio.

params.name: data.text
params.description: The natural language text to be processed. Text length must not exceed 256 character for virtual agent interactions.
